name: Don't Kill The Messenger
description:
The Courier has an important letter to deliver, but to do that, they need to navigate a series of dangerous puzzles!  To make things worse, The Courier isn't very bright - You'll have to keep them safe if they're going to make it there in one piece!

Don't Kill The Messenger is a turn-based puzzle game, where you have to guide the hapless courier to their destination.

Don't Kill The Messenger was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46, with a theme of "Keep it Alive".
